name: Capsule War 2
description:
Capsule war 2

Capsule war 2 is game by Karjalanpiirakka games.

Leaderboard is working only on downloadable version. If you want to use it download the game.

HOW TO

MOVEMENT: W, A, S, D

SHOOT: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

AIM MODE ON/OFF: RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

Weapon  (1):  Button 1

Weapon (2): Button 2


IF MOUSE SENSITIVITY IS TOO HIGH YOU CAN EDIT IT ON SETTINGS

You can also play Capsule war 1 here:https://karjalanpiirakka-games.itch.io/capsule-war

Please send review or comment.
